channel.title: Admin help
channel.description:
Hi i use zamarok server v2 as a client. and when i log in im not admin?
Please help thanks.!

item.title: Admin help
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

::master or go to your file

you will see there

like this

[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000001 character-skill = 1 99 14000001 character-skill = 2 99 14000001 character-skill = 3 99 14000001 character-skill = 4 99 200000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000001 character-skill = 6 99 200000000 character-skill = 7 99 200000000 character-skill = 8 99 200000000 character-skill = 9 99 200000000 character-skill = 10 99 200000000 character-skill = 11 99 200000000 character-skill = 12 99 200000000 character-skill = 13 99 200000000 character-skill = 14 99 200000000 character-skill = 15 99 200000000 character-skill = 16 99 200000000 character-skill = 17 99 200000000 character-skill = 18 99 200000000 character-skill = 19 99 200000000 character-skill = 20 99 200000000 character-skill = 21 99 999999999 character-skill = 22 99 999999999 character-skill = 23 99 999999999 character-skill = 24 99 999999999

change it to this if only you see thim like this codes

item.description:

item.title: Admin help
item.dc:creator: @david760 david760
item.description:
@david760 wrote:

[quote=“ameer122, post:2, topic:358584”]go to your file

example your name in game david760

you will see there a lot of things

go to player right = 0;

change it to

player right = 3;

it worked!!! but why dont i see a staff picture? how do i make me owner?

Read full topic
